System classes of the "Analytics and reporting" module
For the correct functioning of the System, the following system classes are used under the "Analytics and reporting" module:
Dashboard [SYS_DASHBOARD]
Purpose
: The basic type that provides visualisation of various data formats in one area of the screen for easier visual perception of information.
The
dashboard
is set up in as a special visual of the "dashboard" using
analytical panels
.
Attribute composition
of the Dashboard type contains attributes of the
"Object"
parent type and the attributes shown in the following table:
Name
Field name
Value type
Purpose
Restrictions
Setting
DASHB_SCHEMA
Custom
Storing dashboard settings
Filled in automatically based on the user’s settings in the visual
_json settings
DASHB_JSON
Text
Storing settings in the JSON format
Filled in automatically based on user settings in the visual
Display in mobile application
ID_1151158
Boolean
Storage of a display attribute in a mobile application
Filled in manually. Currently, the functionality of displaying dashboards in the mobile application is not supported
Dashboard parameters
SYS_OBJ_PARAM
Child object of the "Object parameters" type [SYS_OBJ_PARAM]
Storing dashboard parameters
Filled in automatically. Defines a list of input parameters required to display data from the source
Visual
DASHB_VISUAL_ID
Object referring to the "Visual" type [SYS_VISUAL]
Storing the dashboard visual
Filled in automatically when setting up the dashboard visual
Gantt chart. Project [SYS_GANT_PROJECT]
Purpose
: The basic type storing
Gantt Chart settings
, which are used as a planning tool for graphic visualisation of the project’s task pool. The chart shows the tasks, the order and the progress of their execution. Instances of the type are displayed in a special "gantteditor" visual.
Attribute composition
The "Gantt chart. Project" attribute in addition to
"Object"
type attributes containing their own attributes and attributes of the "Gantt Chart" [SYS_GANTT] parent type presented in the following table:
Name
Field name
Value type
Purpose
Restrictions
Calendar
CALENDAR_ID
The object referring to the "Calendar" type [SYS_CALENDAR]
Storing the calendar link
Filled in manually. Regulates employees' working days/hours.
Attribute with project tasks
SYS_PR_TASKS_ATTR
The object referring to the "Type attribute" type [SYS_TYPE_ATTR]
Storing the attribute with project task links
Filled in manually. Defines the task name on the chart.
Project
PROJECT_GANT_ID
The object referring to the "Object" type [SYS_OBJECT]
Storing a link to the project
Filled in manually. Defines the project required for visualization.
List of levels for external Gantt tasks
GANTT_TASK_EXT_LIST
The child object of the "Gantt Chart. External task" type [SYS_GANTT_TASK_EXTERNAL]
Storing a link to the list of levels of external tasks
Filled in manually. Defines a list of external tasks.
Gantt chart type
TYPE_GANTT_ID
The object referring to the type "Gantt Chart. Project. Chart" type [SYS_GANTT_TYPE]
Storing a link to the chart type
Filled in automatically. It is necessary for further development of chart settings.
System object type to bind the task
TASK_OBJ_TYPE_ID
The object referring to the "Object type" type [SYS_OBJ_TYPE]
Storing a link to the object type to bind the task to
Filled in manually.
System object type for project binding
PROJECT_TYPE_GANT_ID
The object referring to the "Object type" type [SYS_OBJ_TYPE]
Storing the link to the object type for binding the project
Filled in manually.
Data sources
Purpose
: The basic type that helps to select data that is systematized according to certain criteria. The selection criteria are set using the database query. The System implements several
data sources
, the main ones are:
SQL–based data source
- where the query is written manually in SQL format with validation;
object data source
– where the query is automatically generated based on user-defined rules through the special visual.
The attribute composition of each data source is shown below:
Attribute composition
of the "Data source" type.
Attribute composition
contains attributes of the
"Object"
parent type and the attributes shown in the following table:
Name
Field name
Value type
Purpose
Restrictions
Conditional formatting algorithm
RF_COND_STYLE_ALG
The object referring to the "Algorithm. Data sources" type [SYS_ALG_SOURCE]
Storing a link to the formatting algorithm
Filled in manually. Defines the resulting data style after the query is executed.
Preprocessing unit
RF_DS_PREPARE_BLOCK
Text
Storing the preprocessing unit
Filled in manually.
Parameter with units of measurement
RF_SOURCE_SCALE_PARAM
The object referring to the "Object Parameters" type [SYS_OBJ_PARAM]
Storing the parameter with units of measurement
Filled in manually.
Object parameters
SYS_OBJ_PARAM
The child object of the "Object Parameters" type [SYS_OBJ_PARAM]
Storing the list of parameters
Filled in manually. Defines the list of parameters used in the source. Accessing the ":PARAM" parameter.
System identifier
IDENTIFIER
String
Storage of the data source identifiers
Filled in manually.
Create a primitive type
RF_CREATE_TYPE
Boolean
Storing the attribute for creating a primitive object
Filled in manually. Creates the primitive type inherited from the "Primitive object without a surrogate key" type, where the attributes are the fields of the source.
List of fields
RF_DS_FIELDS_LIST
The child object of the "Data Source. Object data source. Fields" type [RF_DS_FIELDS]
Storing the list of fields
Filled in automatically based on the specified fields in the SQL query.
SQL query text
SQL_TEXT
String
Storing the SQL query text
Filled in manually with the system check of the entered query.
Attribute composition
of the "Data source. Object data source" type.
Attribute composition
contains attributes of the parent type
"Object"
and the attributes shown in the following table:
Name
Field name
Value type
Purpose
Constraints
SQL condition
SQL_COND
Text
Storage of SQL conditions
Filled in automatically if there are conditions.
Enter the query manually
RF_DS_IS_NOT
_GEN_SQL
Boolean
Storing the attribute of manual correction of the SQL query
Filled in manually. Determines whether the request generated by the System can be adjusted automatically.
Exclude duplicates
RF_EXCLUDE
_DOUBLE
Boolean
Storing the duplicate exclusion attribute
Filled in manually. Determines whether the "distinct" operator can be used in a query.
Configuring the data source
RF_DS_CUSTOM
User
Storage of data source settings
Filled in manually. A special visual for sequential configuration of the data source.
Partitions must be used
RF_DS_IS_NEED
_SECTION
Boolean
Storage of the partition usage attribute
Filled in manually.
Display only grouping rows
IS_SHOW_ONLY
_GROUP
Boolean
Storing the attribute for displaying only grouping rows
Filled in manually.
List of groupings
RF_DS_GROUPS
_LIST
A child object of the Data Source type. Object data source. Groupings (Aggregation)" [RF_DS_GROUPS]
Storing a list of groupings
Filled in automatically based on data entered by the user in the visual.
List of totals
RF_DS_TOTAL_LIST
A child object of the Data Source type. Object data source. Totals" [RF_DS_TOTAL]
Storing a list of totals
Filled in automatically based on the data entered by the user in the visual.
List of sections
RF_DS_SECTION
_LIST
A child object of the Data Source type. Object data source. Sections" [RF_DS_SECTION]
Storing a list of sections
Filled in automatically based on the data entered by the user in the visual.
List of type links
RF_DS_LINKS_LIST
A child object of the Data Source type. Object data source. Linking sources" [RF_DS_TYPES
_LINK]
Storing a list of links
Filled in automatically based on the data entered by the user in the visual.
Sorting list
RF_DS_SORT_LIST
A child object of the Data Source type. Object data source. Sorting" [RF_DS_SORT]
Storing the sorting list
Filled in automatically based on the data entered by the user in the visual.
List of types
RF_DS_TYPES_LIST
A child object of the Data Source type. Object data source. Linked types" [RF_DS_TYPES]
Storing a list of types
Filled in automatically based on the data entered by the user in the visual.
Attribute composition
of the "Data source. Remote SQL data source" type.
Attribute composition
contains attributes of the parent type
"Object"
and the attributes shown in the following table:
Name
Field name
Value type
Purpose
Restrictions
Connecting to an external database
RF_CONNECTION
An object referring to the type "ETL. Connection to an external database" [SYS_ETL_DB
_CONNECT]
Storing a link to an external database connection
Filled in manually. Selecting an ETL object to save data to an external source (used during integration).
Cube and OLAP visuals
Purpose
: The basic type that stores data structure, which provides the ability to quickly analyze data beyond the restrictions of relational databases.
The dimension and fact settings are located in the "Cube (new)" type [SYS_CUBE_N], and the final display settings are in the "Cube (View)" type [SYS_CUBE_VIEW_N].
Attribute composition
of the "Cube (New)" type.
Attribute composition
contains attributes of the
"Object"
parent type and the attributes shown in the following table:
Name
Field name
Value type
Purpose
Restrictions
Measurements
SYS_CUBE_DIMS
The object referring to the "Cube dimension" type [SYS_CUBE_DIM]
Storing the list of dimensions
Filled in manually. Defines a list of cube dimensions.
Data sources
SYS_CUBE_DATA_SOURCE
The object referring to the "Data Source" type [RF_SOURCE]
Storing the list of sources
Filled in manually. Defines a list of input parameters required to display the cube.
Object parameters
SYS_OBJ_PARAM
The child object of the "Object parameters" type [SYS_OBJ_PARAM]
Storing the visual parameters
Filled in manually. Defines a list of input parameters required to display the cube.
Cube views
SYS_CUBE_VIEWS
The child object of the "Cube View" type [SYS_CUBE_VIEW_N]
Storing cube views
Filled in manually. Defines the list of cube views.
Dimensions and source fields relation
SYS_CUBE_DIM_FIELD_LNKS
The child object of the "Dimensions and source fields relation" type [SYS_CUBE_LINK_DIM_FIELD]
Storing links of changes with source fields
Filled in manually. Defines a list of cube relations.
Facts and source relations
SYS_CUBE_FACT_LINKS
The child object of the "Fact and source relationship" type [SYS_FACT_SRC_LINK]
Storing fact relationships with sources
Filled in manually. Defines a list of cube connections.
Parameter connection
SYS_CUBE_PARAM_LINK
The child object of the "Cube parameter connection" type [SYS_CUBE_PARAM_LINK]
Storing parameter relationships
Filled in manually. Defines a list of cube connections.
Facts
SYS_CUBE_FACT_IDS
The child object of "Fact (new)" type [SYS_CUBE_FACT_N]
Storing a list of facts
Filled in manually. Defines the list of cube facts.
Attribute composition
of the "Cube View" type.
Attribute composition
contains attributes of the parent type
"Object"
and the attributes shown in the following table:
Name
Field name
Value type
Purpose
Constraints
Cube
SYS_CUBE
The object referring to the "Cube (new)" type [SYS_CUBE_N]
Storing a link to the cube
Filled in manually. Defines the relationship of the Cube view (data source).
Maximum column width (px)
MAX_COL_WIDTH
Number
Storing the maximum column width
Filled manually. Active when using the "Select column width by content" type.
Minimum column width (px)
MIN_COL_WIDTH
Number
Storing the minimum column width
Filled manually. Active when using the "Select column width by content" type.
Show fact names
SYS_VIEW_SHOW_FACTNAME
Boolean
Storing the attribute for displaying the fact names
Filled in manually.
Dimension positions
SYS_CUBE_DIM_POS
The child object of the "Dimension position in the Cube visual" type [SYS_CUBE_DIM_POSITION]
Storing a list of change positions
Filled in manually. Defines the dimension position: on the sidebar, in the header or fixed position.
Hide empty cells (columns)
CUBE_VIEW_HIDEEMPTYCELLS_COL
Boolean
Storing an indication of hidden empty cells in columns
Filled in manually.
Hide empty cells (rows)
CUBE_VIEW_HIDEEMPTYCELLS_ROW
Boolean
Storing an indication of hidden empty cells in rows
Filled in manually.
Type of column width setting
COL_WIDTH_SETTING_TYPE
The object referring to the "Cube. Column width setting type" type [SYS_CUBE_COL_WIDTH_TYPE]
Storing a link to the column width setting type
Filled in manually. Defines the width detection settings.
Column Width (px)
COL_WIDTH
Number
Column width storage
Filled manually. Active when using the "Same width for all columns" type.
Reporting form [RF_REPORT_BY_SOURCE]
Purpose
: The basic type that defines the settings for displaying reporting forms based on the data source. It helps to display data to the end user in a more understandable form.
Attribute composition
of the "Reporting form based on a data source" type contains attributes of the
"Object"
parent type and the attributes shown in the following table:
Name
Field name
Value type
Purpose
Restrictions
Report title algorithm
RF_REPORT_TITLE_ALG
The object referring to the type "Algorithm. Object profiles" [SYS_ALG_CARD]
Storing a link to the title generation algorithm
Filled in manually. Defines the report name.
Enable autofilters when exporting
RF_EXPORT_AUTOFILTERS
Boolean
Storing the autofilter activation attribute
Filled in manually. The parameter for uploading to MS EXCEL.
Output parameters when exporting
RF_EXPORT_PARAMS
Boolean
Storing an attribute during export parameter output
Filled in manually. The parameter for uploading to MS EXCEL.
Report header grouping
HEADER_GROUP
Text
Storing the report header grouping
Filled in manually using the buttons. Determines whether grouping can be created for columns.
Use the print area by default
RF_REPORT_PRINT_AREA
Boolean
Storing the use of the print area indication
Filled in manually. The parameter for uploading to MS EXCEL.
Data source
RF_SOURCE
The object referring to the "Data Source" type [RF_SOURCE]
Storing a link to the data source
Filled in manually. Defines the composition of columns and report data.
Fixed columns numbe
RF_FIXED_COLUMNS_COUNT
Integer
Storing the number of fixed columns
Filled manually.
Fixed rows number
RF_FIXED_ROWS_COUNT
Integer
Storing the number of fixed rows
Filled in manually.
EXCEL sheet orientation
EXCEL_SHEET_ORIENT
The object referring to the "EXCEL sheet orientation" type [EXCEL_SHEET_ORIENT]
Storing a link to the sheet orientation
Filled in manually. The parameter for uploading to MS EXCEL.
Page layout - the height (of pages)
RF_SHEET_HEIGHT
Integer
Storing the page height
Filled in manually. The parameter for uploading to MS EXCEL.
Page layout - scale (%)
RF_SHEET_SCALE
Integer
Storing the page scale
Filled in manually. The parameter for uploading to MS EXCEL.
Page layout - the width (of pages)
RF_SHEET_WIDTH
Integer
Storing the page width
Filled in manually. The parameter for uploading to MS EXCEL.
Report title style
RF_REPORT_TITLE_STYLE
The object referring to the "Formatting and tooltip styles" type [STYLES_DICTIONARY]
Storing a link to the formatting style of the report body
Filled in manually. Defines the style of the title.
Header formatting style
HEADER_STYLE
The object referring to the "Formatting and tooltip styles" type [STYLES_DICTIONARY]
Storing a link to the header formatting style
Filled in manually. Defines the styling of the report header.
